name: Project Mc2 Lab Grab
description:
Hello recruit,

NOV8 (that’s “innovate”), a top-secret organization of super smart spies from all over the world, has selected YOU as one of our new recruits. Before testing you out in the field, we need you to perform a series of Ops Tests, use your detective-like eye to match items and collect them for experiments, under the leadership of A.D.I.S.N (that’s me!!!). This Ultimate Lab Kit contains 100 levels of challenges filled with slime, ice, and power-ups that will expose how awesome you are! Complete all five experiments with your Lab Kit to see if you have what it takes to be an NOV8 agent.

Good luck.
-A.D.I.S.N. :)
#SmartIsTheNewCool with Project Mc2!
